item.title: SKG Sangha, India, Biogas and fertiliser from slurry - Ashden Award winner
item.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gklJIPFyhIc SKG Sangha has radically improved the lives of thousands of rural families in Karnataka, South India by supplying them with both dung based biogas plants for cooking and a specially designed unit that turns the slurry from the biogas plant into high quality fertiliser. The benefits of biogas are well known. It provides rural women with a cheap, reliable source of energy as well as reducing indoor air pollution and easing pressure on forest resources.
